SQL.LOAD: SELECT trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_create_date, xml_comment_type_code, xml_comments, xml_caller_name, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_followup_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_followup WHERE trans_dtl_followup_id = :trans_dtl_followup_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_followup SET trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_create_date = :xml_create_date, xml_comment_type_code = :xml_comment_type_code, xml_comments = :xml_comments, xml_caller_name = :xml_caller_name, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_followup_id = :trans_dtl_followup_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_trans_dtl_followup ( trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_create_date, xml_comment_type_code, xml_comments, xml_caller_name, created_by, trans_dtl_followup_id ) VALUES ( :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, :xml_create_date, :xml_comment_type_code, :xml_comments, :xml_caller_name, :created_by, :trans_dtl_followup_id )
